func_sig.description: Evaluate and solve algebraic expressions and equations provided as strings which can contain multiple expressions separated by commas or semicolons. It now handles syntax issues and symbol management better.
func_sig.name: evaluate_algebra

expression.description: The algebraic expression or equation to evaluate. Expressions can be separated by commas or semicolons.

variable_values.description: A dictionary containing variable values to substitute, if any.

func_sig.description: Solve various standard triangle properties, including calculating heights, medians, angles, and area given different initial parameters.
func_sig.name: solve_triangle_properties

angle_unit.description: The unit for angles, either 'degrees' or 'radians'.

side1.description: The first side length of the triangle.

side2.description: The second side length of the triangle.

side3.description: The third side length (or hypotenuse if needed) of the triangle.

func_sig.description: Evaluate arithmetic or mathematical expressions provided as strings. Now improved to handle expressions specifically involving powers, fractions, and decimals more effectively. Additionally, provide more informative error messages for debugging.
func_sig.name: evaluate_expression
